title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 302.4 - Fines, fees, deposits and charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 302.4 - Fines, fees, deposits and charges

State Regulations

The chancellor or his designee is hereby authorized to
establish a schedule of reasonable fines, fees, deposits and charges in
accordance with guidelines to be issued by the trustees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
302.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
